project.name: jquery.jqslider
project.description: A fast and responsive content slider

JQSlider.name: JQSlider
JQSlider.description:
A responsive and fast content Slider
jQSlider follows a new approach in building a slider. Where most slider-plugins
are moving the whole list of slides when animating, jQSlider animates only the
two slides necessary for the animation simultaneously. This is not only an way
to optimize the performance of the animation, it also allows to realize a 100%
css based scaling which leads us to a full responsive slider.
JQSlider.author: Marcello di Simone <mdisimone.dev@googlemail.com>
example:
Add the following markup to your page
And initialize the slider with the following script block $(document).ready(function () { $('.jqslider').jqslider(); });

params.name: elem
params.description: element to be initialized

params.name: options
params.description: Options for the Plugin Member

props.name: circular
props.description:
You can prevent an automatic
    initialisation of the slider if you want to run it later on. This
    is than helpful, if you need the instance of the plugin to access
    its methods, like `addSlide`, but you don't want the slides to
    be setup. Because `JQSlider` adds classes to all elements that
    applies styling to it, like hiding not needed slides, so that it
    can prevent you from determining the correct height and width
    values of its child elements.

props.name: startSlide
props.description:
Defines the slide number to be
    shown initially

props.name: easingFunction
props.description:
If you have included
    the easing plugin, you can define an easing function for the animation.

props.name: containerSelector
props.description:
Define
    the jquery selector of the container element for querying. Must
    be represented in the markup.

props.name: listSelector
props.description:
Define the jquery selector of
    the list element for querying.

props.name: slideTag
props.description:
Define the tag name of the
    slide element for querying. It will be used for building the HTML
    template when

params.description: Aliased `jQuery` object or alternatively `Zepto`.

params.name: windows
params.description: Reference to the `window` object

params.name: document
params.description: Reference to the `document` object

params.name: undefined
params.description:
this is just a way to assure that undefined has
     not been overloaded with some other value than undefined

classitems.description: Stores a reference to the jQuery object of the module
classitems.name: $el

classitems.description:
Object with the configuration options of the module, the plugin
defaults will be extended with options passed while initialisation
and last by options set in the `data-options attribute of the HTML
element of the slider
classitems.name: _o

classitems.description:
Defines if the layout of the slider is vertical or not. Will be
defined initially by the css class 'jqs-vertical' of the element.
classitems.name: isVertical

classitems.description: set to true while animating to prevent double clicking
classitems.name: _block

classitems.description: alignment value shortcuts
classitems.name: _av

classitems.description:
This "template" is used to generate new slides, it is build using the
`slideTag config value.
classitems.name: _tmpl

classitems.description: reference of the slider container
classitems.name: _container

classitems.description: reference of the slider list element
classitems.name: _list

classitems.description: jQuery set of all slide elements
classitems.name: _slides

classitems.description:
Stores all configuration settings, this set will be extended with
client configuration objects
classitems.name: defaults

classitems.description:
You can prevent an automatic initialisation of the slider if you
want to run it later on. This is than helpful, if you need the
instance of the plugin to access its methods, like addSlide, but
you don't want the slides to be setup. Because JQSlider adds
classes to all elements that applies styling to it, like hiding
not needed slides, so that it can prevent you from determining
the correct height and width values of its child elements.
classitems.name: autoinit

classitems.description: Set to true, for an endless animation.
classitems.name: circular

classitems.description: Zero based index of the slide to start with
classitems.name: startSlide

classitems.description: Duration of the animation
classitems.name: duration

classitems.description:
If you have included the easing plugin, you can define an easing
function for the animation.
classitems.name: easingFunction

classitems.description:
Define the jquery selector of the container element for querying.
Must be represented in the markup.
classitems.name: containerSelector

classitems.description: Define the jquery selector of the list element for querying.
classitems.name: listSelector

classitems.description:
Define the tag name of the slide element for querying. It will be
used for building the HTML template when creating a new slide.
classitems.name: slideTag

classitems.description: Moves to the next slide
classitems.name: next

classitems.description: Moves to the previous slide
classitems.name: prev

classitems.description:
Moves to the given slide number. The direction, based on the
orientation (horizontal/vertical), can be set with counterwise. If
you want to jump directly to the slide, without an animation, pass
`noAnimation` as true.
classitems.name: gotoSlide

params.name: slideNumber
params.description: number of slide to go to

params.name: counterwise
params.description:
optional set to true if the
  animation should go to the opposite direction

params.name: noAnimation
params.description:
optional set to true if slide
  should be shown instantly without an animation

return.description: returns a chainable reference to JQSlider

classitems.description:
This function is called when the animation started. It is excluded
from the animation method to help building a inherited Slider class.
In this case it triggers the animation start event.
classitems.name: _startAnimation

params.name: slideNumber
params.description: Number of the slide that had been animated in

params.name: counterwise
params.description:
if true the animation will move to the left
  or top if it's a vertical animation

params.name: noAnimation
params.description:
if true the slide will be shown right away,
  without animation

params.name: current
params.description:
`jQuery` element of the slide that was
  animated out

params.name: next
params.description:
`jQuery` element of the slide that was
  animated in

classitems.description:
This function is called when the animation ends. All slides are reset
to default with the next slide as current slide. It is excluded from
the animation method to help building a inherited Slider class.
classitems.name: _endAnimation

params.name: slideNumber
params.description: Number of the slide that had been animated in

params.name: counterwise
params.description:
if true the animation will move to the left
  or top if it's a vertical animation

params.name: noAnimation
params.description:
if true the slide will be shown right away,
  without animation

params.name: current
params.description:
`jQuery` element of the slide that was
  animated out

params.name: next
params.description:
`jQuery` element of the slide that was
  animated in

classitems.description: Returns the zero based length of the slides array.
classitems.name: getSlideCount

return.description: returns the number of all slides

classitems.description: Switches the orientation of the slider between horizontal and vertical.
classitems.name: switchOrientation

return.description: returns a chainable reference to JQSlider

classitems.description:
Adds a new slide node into the slide container. Optionally the position
of the new slide can be defined with `slidePosition`.
classitems.name: addSlide

params.name: slidePosition
params.description: position of the new slide to be appended to

return.description: returns the `jQuery` object of the created slide

classitems.description: Returns the slide node at the given index

return.description:
returns the `jQuery` object of the slide with the
passed index

classitems.description: Removes a given slide, defined by the index or ID, or a whole `jQuery` slide set.
classitems.name: removeSlide

params.name: slide
params.description:
index, ID or `jQuery` set of the
  slide to be removed

classitems.description: Returns the zero based position of the following slider.
classitems.name: _getSibblingIndex

return.description: returns index of next slide or false

classitems.description:
Hides the previous handler, respectively next handler, if no circular
animation is configured and the first, respectively last slide is
reached.
classitems.name: _resetControls

classitems.description:
Initializes the slider and all slides, set class names on all objects
and display the first slide
classitems.name: _initSlider

classitems.description:
Index of the current active slide. Can be defined by configuration
or by adding the class `jqs-current` to the appropriate slide.
classitems.name: activeIndex

classitems.description:
Initialises the Slider controls and binds them to the previous and
next methods.
classitems.name: _initControls

classitems.description:
`jQuery` set with all handlers found inside the `JQSlider` element
with the class defined in css.handler.
classitems.name: _handlers

classitems.description:
`jQuery` set with all handlers found inside the `JQSlider` element
with the class defined in css.nextHandler.
classitems.name: _nextHandler

classitems.description:
`jQuery` set with all handlers found inside the `JQSlider` element
with the class defined in css.prevHandler.
classitems.name: _prevHandler

classitems.description:
Initializes the `JQSlider` plugin and binds the available events to it.
Finally it triggers the init event.
classitems.name: init

classitems.description: maps the event prev to the API method next
classitems.name: prev

classitems.description: maps the event next to the API method next
classitems.name: next

classitems.description: maps the event gotoslide to the API methdo gotoSlide
classitems.name: gotoslide

params.name: slideNumber
params.description: number of slide to go to

params.name: counterwise
params.description:
optional set to true if
  the animation should go to the opposite direction

params.name: noAnimation
params.description:
optional set to true if
  slide should be shown instantly without an animation

classitems.description:
Initialize each object of the jQuery set as an instance of JQSlider, sets
a reference to the instance in data-jqslider which is used as a singleton.
classitems.name: jqslider

params.name: options
params.description: Object with plugin settings
